original: Lundberg, Sven Hjalmar, v. konsul, bokhandlare, Visby, f. 20/8/82 i Karlstad av reg:läk. Nikolaus L. o. Hildegard Bergquist. G. 12 m. Olga Anders- son. Barn: Inga f. 13, Brita 15, Gösta 18. — Karlstads h. a. 1., uti. prakt. Res. t. Tyskl. 98, 07, 08, 21 o. 31, Frankr. 08, Schweiz 21 o. 31, Österr. 21, Ital. 31, Estl. o. Finl. 37 o. 38. Anst. i Hj. Petersson & Co. bokhand. i Karlstad 98-01, i Nermans bokhand. i Norrköp. 01-07, i Goeritz Buchhandl. i Braun-schweig 0’7-08, verkst. dir. i A-B Sylve Norrbys Bokhand. i Visby fr. 08, ensam inneh. sed. 26. Ordf. i styr. f. A-B Sylve Norrbys Bokhand., led. av istyr. f. riksbankens avd :kont. i Visby, A-B Visby kolimp. o. Visby tenniskl. Medl. av Frimurarorden, Odd Fellow o. 1882 års män. Estnisk v. konsul 30.
translated: Lundberg, Sven Hjalmar, honorary consul, bookseller, Visby, b. 20/8/82 in Karlstad to registered physician Nikolaus L. and Hildegard Bergquist. Married on 12 m. to Olga Andersson. Children: Inga b. 13, Brita b. 15, Gösta b. 18. Moved to Karlstad early age. Travelled to Germany in 1898, 1907, 1908, 1921 and 1931, France in 1908, Switzerland in 1921 and 1931, Austria in 1921, Italy in 1931, Estonia and Finland in 1937 and 1938. Employed at Hj. Petersson & Co. booksellers in Karlstad from 1898 to 1901, Nermans booksellers in Norrköping from 1901 to 1907, Goeritz Buchhandl. in Braunschweig from 1907 to 1908, appointed managing director at A-B Sylve Norrbys Bokhandel in Visby from 1908, sole proprietor since 1926. Chairman of the board for A-B Sylve Norrbys Bokhandel, member of the board for the local branch of the national bank in Visby, A-B Visby kolimp. and Visby tennis club. Member of the Freemasons, Odd Fellow, and the 1882 men's association. Estonian honorary consul in 1930.
